profiles.name: Calm Narrator
profiles.description: Calm middle-aged male narrator with a deep warm baritone voice, slow measured pace, soothing and trustworthy tone, suitable for audiobook narration
profiles.sample_text: The morning sun rose gently over the quiet village, casting golden light across the cobblestone streets. Birds sang their morning songs as the world slowly came to life.

profiles.name: Cheerful Girl
profiles.description: Young adult female with a crisp energetic soprano voice, fast lively pace, cheerful and bubbly tone, suitable for upbeat narration and enthusiastic announcements
profiles.sample_text: Hey everyone, welcome back\! I have some amazing news to share with you today, and I just can't wait to get started\!

profiles.name: Shakespeare
profiles.description: Mature deep male voice with rich theatrical baritone resonance, dramatic gravitas and passionate intensity, slow commanding pace with deliberate pauses, powerful projection like a seasoned Shakespearean stage actor performing a soliloquy in a grand theater
profiles.sample_text: The morning sun rose gently over the quiet village, casting golden light across the cobblestone streets. Birds sang their morning songs as the world slowly came to life.

profiles.name: Panic Granny
profiles.description: Elderly woman in her late 70s with a high-pitched shaky trembling voice, fast frantic pace, panicked and breathless tone with occasional gasps, quivering and anxious delivery, suitable for dramatic alarmed storytelling
profiles.sample_text: The morning sun rose gently over the quiet village, casting golden light across the cobblestone streets. Birds sang their morning songs as the world slowly came to life.

profiles.ref_text: Every week, you know, when FC was alive, nobody cared about him. When he's dead, they care about him. But it's really a Democrat problem. It's not a Republican, it's a Democrat.
